title: Утренняя роса
author: Cherkasova Iren
description:
This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. 'A Morning Dew' is related to impressionism being a representative of still-life genre. 

This artwork has a Guiness certificate for being exhibited in more than 10000 meters height. It took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates and galleries art catalogues.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
